name: MFF:SUSTAINABLE URBAN TRANSPORT INVESTMENT PROGRAM-TRANCHE 3
info: Project 3 will improve the urban transport system and infrastructure in urban areas and comprises two subprojects: (i) section 2 (km 4.0-10.8) of the international standard Tbilisi-Rustavi Urban Road Link; and (ii) phase 2 of Anaklia Coastal Improvement; both of which are in line with components of the Investment Program. The government, through the Ministry of Finance, has submitted the periodic financing request for Tranche 3, requesting a loan of $73 million from ADB's ordinary capital resources. These investments will improve the urban environment, strengthen economic and tourism development, and regional integration.
